span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adv. 得体的，遵守礼节的： following the established traditions of refined society and good taste
【例】 a young lady of seemly appearance, robust health, and keen intelligence 一个打扮得体、身体健康、头脑敏锐的姑娘
【近】 befitting, decent, decorous, genteel, respectable
【反】 uncouth, ribald, indecorous, improper, inappropriate, indecent, indelicate, unbecoming, ungenteel, unseemly 粗俗的，不礼貌的

【记】 seem 好看的；
【另】 comely 清秀标致的
